body:
Hey everyone, theres no story behind it, I just randomly came up with this idea:

I thought it would be cool to get to know a bit more about each other in a neat, easy going way, so here's how it works:

Comment below 5 random, but somewhat interesting facts about yourself, that may involve your hobbies, what you're good at, personal experience, etc.

Ill start as an example -

1. My in game name, OPTOBAT, has no meaning - it just popped up in my head!
2. I am a HUGE fan of hip hop, particularly Eminem
3. I am Australian-American: My mum is Australian, and my dad is American.
4. In 2011, in 6th grade, in the middle of the night, I saw what appeared to be a UFO
5. My two most favourite and successful subjects are English and Media/Film

Your turn!
